hints.content: We can use the science book to compare the heights of the math and grammar books.

My math book is taller than my science book.  

My grammar book is shorter than my science book.
So, my math book must be taller than my grammar book.

The books below are in order from tallest to shortest:



![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/469d0f83d7bb351c43cb8d9018e7f36f.png)

question.content:
My math book is taller than my science book.  
My science book is taller than my grammar book.

**Order the books from tallest to shortest.**  
*Put the tallest book on the left.*

[[☃ sorter 1]]
